content.query:
CREATE DATABASE adf_uat
GO
use adf_uat
GO

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS dbo.Monitor
GO
CREATE VIEW dbo.Monitor
AS
SELECT
    *,
        REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([Run start],',',''),'AM',''),'PM','')as [Start time], 
        REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([Run end],',',''),'AM',''),'PM','') as [End time] 
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://sqlday2023.dfs.core.windows.net/bronze/monitor/part-00000-13861fd6-b11e-42a4-ac3b-163984640fe5-c000.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]


go

select top 10 * from dbo.Monitor
GO


SELECT [Pipeline name], COUNT(*)
FROM dbo.Monitor
GROUP BY [Pipeline name]
